channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Who will win the presidential election? The Trump trade offers a clue
item.description: Based on 538's latest analysis of presidential polls, Trump now has the barest advantage in the race, with a 52-in-100 chance to win.

item.title: Mail carriers reach deal with USPS for pay raises and air-conditioned trucks
item.description: All city carriers will get three annual pay increases of 1.3% each by 2025, some of which will be paid retroactively from November 2023.

item.title: Happy 60th Anniversary CAPM! Why the Capital Asset Pricing Model Still Matters
